mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE ( USEQ, UEMAIL, UNICK, UPWD, UIMG, UDELFLAG ) VALUES ( USER_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{uemail}, #{unick}, #{upwd},#{uimg},'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_TABLE WHERE UEMAIL=? AND UPWD=?
SELECT UEMAIL AS CONT FORM USER_TABLE WHERE UEMAIL=#{uemail}
SELECT UNICK AS CONT FORM USER_TABLE WHERE UNICK=#{unick}
SELECT USEQ, UEMAIL, UNICK, UIMG, UMSEQ, UFMSEQ, UFUSEQ, URSEQ, UUPRSEQ, UDOWRNSEQ FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USEQ=#{useq}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET UIMG=#{uimg} WHERE USEQ=#{useq}
UPDATE USER_TABLE SET UPWD=#{upwd} WHERE USEQ=#{useq}
mapper.select: SELECT UFMSEQ FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USEQ=#{useq} ORDER BY UFMSEQ DESC
SELECT UFUSEQ FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USEQ=#{useq} ORDER BY UFUSEQ DESC
SELECT USEQ,RSEQ,RMSEQ,RUSEQ,MTITLE,RCONTENT FROM USER_TABLE, REVIEW_TABLE, MOVIE_TABLE WHERE REVIEW_TABLE.RUSEQ=USER_TABLE.USEQ AND USEQ=#{useq} ORDER BY RSEQ DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET UDELFLAG='Y' WHERE USEQ=#{useq}
